meanings.definition: One who wears a motley or varied costume.
meanings.sent1: The motleyer at the circus wore a colorful outfit.
meanings.sent2: The motleyer stood out in the crowd with their mismatched clothes.
meanings.sent3: The motleyer's costume made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a motleyer of patterns and colors.
meanings.sent5: The motleyer's attire was a vibrant mix of hues and styles.

meanings.definition: To make more varied or diverse.
meanings.sent1: She decided to motleyer her salad by adding different vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The artist wanted to motleyer the painting with various shades.
meanings.sent3: He tried to motleyer his routine by changing his workout schedule.
meanings.sent4: The chef aimed to motleyer the menu by introducing new dishes.
meanings.sent5: The garden was motleyered with a variety of flowers and plants.
